text: John Gordon McVie BSc (Hons), MBChB, M.D., FRCP, FRCPE, FRCPSGlas, FMedSci, DSc (13 January 1945 - 20 January 2021) was a British oncologist. He was one of the best known doctors on the treatment and research of cancer. He wrote over 350 peer-reviewed articles, editorials and books. He was a professor at King's College London. McVie died on 20 January 2021, aged 76.Professor Gordon McVie ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scientists from London Category:Academics of the University of London
